mainText:
Dear Steve,

Thank you for touching society with your brilliant visions and  
innovation. From Woz's garage to having your inventions tucked in  
hundreds of millions of pockets, in corners of the world people other  
than yourself would never have imagined. You changed how we read  
books, listen to music, and receive information.

You are one of the all-time greats on the Mt. Rushmore of innovation  
along with Edison and Da Vinci. I will watch and listen to your  
Stanford speech on one of your inventions when I am in need of  
inspiration.

Thank you Steve. Rest in peace.
author: Alan
location: from Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
